titles.title: Prohibition Against Criminal Alien Reentry Act of 2007
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase criminal penalties for certain removed aliens who illegally reenter the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

bill.summary:
7/24/2007--Introduced.
Prohibition Against Criminal Alien Reentry Act of 2007 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase criminal penalties for certain removed aliens who illegally reenter the United States.
